metadata.synopsis: You've just clicked on a plaque beside a door in the Tollhouse, which tells you that room is for confiscated items. The way into the room is blocked by vegetation/fallen masonry (don't be specific).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on plaque outside 'Confiscated Items' room in TWN Tollhouse. ( S_TWN_Tollhouse_ConfiscatedItemsPlaque )

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Well, we're not getting in this way.
